bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a shang sun 傷損 , injury, of skin and flesh resulting from being scratched by the claws or nails of an animal or human. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry fen xi 粉 錫 quotes Bin hu ji jian fang 瀕湖集簡方 : 抓傷面皮：香油調鉛粉搽之，一夕愈 , “ Injury of facial skin from scratching claws : Mix xiang you with qian fen and apply externally. It will heal overnight”.
